sys_variable_value.value:
Dear Employee,

We regret to inform you that your leave request has been rejected by your manager.

Best regards,
Automated HR System

Dear Employee,

This is to inform you that your leave request has been approved by your manager. Please ensure any pending work is delegated appropriately to avoid disruptions during your absence.

If you have any questions or require further assistance, kindly reach out to your manager before your leave begins.

Wishing you a pleasant time off!

Best regards,
Automated HR System

sys_pd_activity.description: Before going on vacation, the employee is required to conduct a Knowledge Transfer (KT) session with their team to ensure seamless operations in their absence. The KT should cover ongoing projects, key responsibilities, deadlines, and any critical information that the group needs to manage tasks efficiently.
sys_pd_activity.label: Give KT
sys_pd_activity.name: create_task_1

sys_pd_activity.label: Cancellation of Leave Due to Incomplete Knowledge Transfer (KT) and Work
sys_pd_activity.name: send_an_email_4

sys_variable_value.value:
Dear Employee,

I hope you are doing well.

Unfortunately, we have to inform you that your upcoming leave, scheduled from [Start Date] to [End Date], has been cancelled. This decision was made due to the inability to complete the necessary Knowledge Transfer (KT) and other critical work responsibilities before your intended time off.

To avoid any disruptions to ongoing projects and ensure the team's productivity, it is essential that all KT and pending tasks are fully completed. Please coordinate with your manager to finalize these activities and discuss any potential alternative leave dates if needed.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Best regards,
Cancellation of Leave Due to Incomplete Knowledge Transfer (KT) and Work

sys_pd_activity.label: Thank You for Completing KT and Closing Tasks
sys_pd_activity.name: send_an_email_3

sys_variable_value.value:
Dear Employee,

I want to take a moment to thank you for successfully completing the Knowledge Transfer (KT) session and ensuring all your tasks were wrapped up before your leave. Your efforts to ensure a smooth handover are greatly appreciated and will help maintain continuity while you're away.

With this, all related tasks are considered closed, and you are good to proceed with your scheduled leave. If there is anything further required, we will reach out, but everything looks well-prepared.

Enjoy your time off, and we look forward to your return!

Best regards,
Thank You for Completing KT and Closing Tasks
